name: Bug
description: Something isn't working

name: Documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation

name: Duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: Enhancement
description: New feature or request

name: For: App
description: Content for general App

name: For: Marketing
description: Content for marketing proposal

name: Help wanted
description: Extra attention is needed

name: Invalid
description: This doesn't seem right

name: Priority: Critical
description: Critical, needs to check quickly

name: Priority: High
description: Priority level high

name: Priority: Low
description: Priority level low

name: Priority: Medium
description: Priority level medium

name: Question
description: Further information is requested

name: Status: Changes Requested
description: Changes requested for better optimization or to make new functionality that should be add in the application

name: Status: Complete
description: Task, feature, implemented without problems

name: Status: Confirmed
description: Task, feature confirmed ready for review

name: Status: Debugging
description: Code debugging and searching errors on it

name: Status: Feedback Needed
description: Feedback priority in some task, features, code...

name: Status: Generate Conflicts
description: Feature that generates conflicts on code deployment

name: Status: In Observation
description: Code implemented and feature is under observation in case generates conflicts

name: Status: In Progress
description: Still in progress or developing or checking functionality

name: Status: On Discussion
description: Feature or new function to implement, that need a little discussion over it

name: Status: On Hold
description: Task, feature is hold due to time or no people working there right now

name: Status: Ready for Merge
description: Feature ready for merge and see functionality and how works

name: Status: Ready for Test
description: Feature confirmed and already finished, need some test before deploy on main branch

name: Status: Review Needed
description: Feature, task or code needs review for check the functionality

name: Status: Stopped
description: Currently functionality stopped

name: Status: Under Consideration
description: Developers thinking about the implementation of the feature, suggestion...

name: Stopped
description: This feature is stopped or is not going to be implemented now

name: Type: Bug
description: Bug exists on code development, needs to check, review for fast push

name: Type: Documentation
description: For code documentation issues or recomendation

name: Type: Enhancement
description: Enhancement for application that need to be review

name: Type: Feature
description: New feature to implement, need review

name: Type: Help Needed
description: Attention is needed

name: Type: Idea
description: Idea, or suggestion for change some functionality on application

name: Type: Question
description: Question, for explain what exactly want to implement

name: Type: Refactoring
description: Improvements for code, refactoring code on application

name: Type: Regression
description: Suggestion for regression for an older version due to instability

name: Type: Security
description: Layer of security level, bug or zero day appears that compromise application functionality

name: Wontfix
description: This will not be worked on
